FuncDef: This command configures the user password for console and FTP access.

ParaDef.Info: This is the password for the user that must be entered by this user during the login procedure. The minimum length of the password is determined by the minimum-length command. The maximum length can be up to 20 chars if unhashed, 32 characters if hashed. The complexity requirements for the password is determined by the complexity-rules command and must be followed; otherwise, the password will not be accepted.
